mapper.sql: uuid, menu_title, menu_type, menu_url, menu_page_class, menu_page_other, order_by, delete_status, remarks
mapper.insert:
insert into t_menu_system
uuid,
menu_title,
menu_type,
menu_url,
menu_page_class,
menu_page_other,
order_by,
delete_status,
remarks,

mapper.update:
update t_menu_system
menu_title = #{menuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_page_class = #{menuPageClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_page_other = #{menuPageOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_by = #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_menu_system set menu_title = #{menuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_page_class = #{menuPageClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_page_other = #{menuPageOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_by = #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT S.* FROM t_menu_system S JOIN t_sys_role_menusys R ON S.`uuid`=R.`menusys_uuid` WHERE R.`role_uuid` =#{roleId}
